publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7690 Sandra White: Two Fat Ladiesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the restaurant, Two Fat Ladies, in Partick, Glasgow, on winning the Best in The World competition, run by iwantogothere.com; further congratulates Des Mullan, operations director at the restaurant, and Ryan James, the owner and chairman of the Glasgow Restaurant Association, for their success in both winning the award and in further highlighting all that Glasgow has to offer, and wishes them continuing success in the future as they now look forward to landing best Seafood Restaurant of the Year at the Scottish Restaurant Awards taking place in the Glasgow Science Centre on Monday 28 February 2011. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jim Tolson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Jamie Stone*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7690 Two Fat Ladies (lodged on 11 January 2011) Rob Gibson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Jackson Carlaw*, Patrick Harvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*
